OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

cmdBankInfo.label: Command
cmdBankInfo.tooltip: Command to display information about your bank. LEAVE ALONE!

cmdCreateChecking.label: Command
cmdCreateChecking.tooltip: Command to create a checking account. LEAVE ALONE!

cmdDepositChecking.label: Command
cmdDepositChecking.tooltip: Command to deposit money into a checking account. LEAVE ALONE!

cmdWithdrawChecking.label: Command
cmdWithdrawChecking.tooltip: Command to withdrawal money from a checking account. LEAVE ALONE!

cmdCreateSavings.label: Command
cmdCreateSavings.tooltip: Command to create a savings account. LEAVE ALONE!

cmdDepositSavings.label: Command
cmdDepositSavings.tooltip: Command to deposit money into a savings account. LEAVE ALONE!

cmdWithdrawSavings.label: Command
cmdWithdrawSavings.tooltip: Command to withdrawal money from a savings account. LEAVE ALONE!

cmdWireTransfer.label: Wire Transfer Command
cmdWireTransfer.tooltip: Command to allow users to give anther user currency. LEAVE ALONE!

SavingsInterestPercent.label: Saving Account Interest (Percentage 1 = 1%)
SavingsInterestPercent.tooltip: Interest to add to a user's savings account. Must be a whole number!

SavingsInterestAdd.label: Interest Interval (Days)
SavingsInterestAdd.tooltip: How often to add interest to someone's savings account.

WireTransferCost.label: Wire Transfer Cost
WireTransferCost.tooltip: How much to charge a user for transferring currency to another user.

CheckingAccountCreated.value: {0}, you have created a new checking account at {1}.
CheckingAccountCreated.label: Checking Account Created Responce
CheckingAccountCreated.tooltip:
Tells the user they created a checking account. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Bank Name

CheckingAccountAlreadyCreated.value: {0}, you already created a checking account.
CheckingAccountAlreadyCreated.label: Checking Account Already Created Response
CheckingAccountAlreadyCreated.tooltip:
Tells the user they already have a checking account. 
 {0} = user

NoCheckingAccount.value: {0}, you do not have a checking account at {1}.
NoCheckingAccount.label: No Checking Account Response
NoCheckingAccount.tooltip:
Tells the user they don't have a checking account.
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Bank Name

CheckingAccountDeposit.label: Checking Account Deposit Response
CheckingAccountDeposit.tooltip:
Tells the user that they deposited into their checking account. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Amount Deposited 
 {2} = Currency Name 
 {3} = Bank Name

CheckingWithdrawal.value: {0}, you just withdrew {1} {2} from your checking account at {3}.
CheckingWithdrawal.label: Checking Withdrawal Response
CheckingWithdrawal.tooltip:
Tells a user that they withdrew from their checking account. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Amount Withdrawn 
 {2} = Currency Name 
 {3} = Bank Name

SavingAccountCreated.value: {0}, you have created a new savings account at {1}.
SavingAccountCreated.label: Savings Account Created Response
SavingAccountCreated.tooltip:
Tells the user their savings account was created.
 {0} = user 
 {1} =  Bank Name

SavingsAccountAlreadyCreated.value: {0}, you already created a savings account at {1}.
SavingsAccountAlreadyCreated.label: Savings Account Already Created Response
SavingsAccountAlreadyCreated.tooltip:
Tells a user they already have a savings account. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Bank Name

NoSavingsAccount.value: {0}, you do not have a savings account at {1}.
NoSavingsAccount.label: No Savings Account Response
NoSavingsAccount.tooltip:
Tells a user they do not have a savings account. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Bank Name

SavingsDeposit.label: Savings Deposit Response
SavingsDeposit.tooltip:
Shows user that they depoisted into the savings account.. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Amount Deposted 
 {2} = Currency Name 
 {3} = Bank Name

SavingsWithdrawal.value: {0}, you just withdrew {1} {2} from your savings accounts at {3}.
SavingsWithdrawal.label: Savings Withdraw Response
SavingsWithdrawal.tooltip:
Displays message about user withdrawal from savings account. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Amount Withdrawn 
 {2} = Currency Name 
 {3} = Bank Name

WireTransferSent.label: Wire Transer Sent Response
WireTransferSent.tooltip:
Tells a user they just got money via a wire transfer. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = user being sent money 
 {2} = Amount sent to {1}

WireTransferFailed.value: {0}, there was a problem with sending {1} {2}.
WireTransferFailed.label: Wire Transfer Fail Response
WireTransferFailed.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when wire transfer has failed. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = user being sent money 
 {2} = Bank Name

BankingUsage.label: Chat Options
BankingUsage.tooltip: Select where you want the command to be used from.

BankingPermissions.label: Permission level
BankingPermissions.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

BankingPermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
BankingPermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

NoCurrency.value: {0} -> You don't have any currency to use that command.
NoCurrency.label: Wire Transfer Fail Response
